content: जप् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (जपति, जपित or जप्त) {@--1@} To utter in a low voice, repeat internally, mutter; जपन्नपि तवैवालापमंत्रावलिं <ls>Gīt. 5</ls>; हरिरिति हरिरिति जपति सकामं <ls>Gīt. 4</ls>; <ls>N. 11. 26.</ls> {@--2@} To mutter prayers or spells; <ls>Ms. 11. 194</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 11.">251</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 11.">260.</ls> {@--3@} To pray to one or invoke in a low voice.
